outputs.description: an array containing objects of the form `{address: amount}`. The `amount` may be the string *all*, indicating that all onchain funds be sent to the specified address. Otherwise, it is in satoshi precision; it can be a whole number, a whole number ending in *sat*, a whole number ending in *000msat*, or a number with 1 to 8 decimal places ending in  *btc*

feerate.description: feerate used for the withdrawals. See NOTES in lightning-feerates(7) for possible values. The default is *normal*

minconf.description: minimum number of confirmations that used outputs should have. Default is 1

items.description: utxos to be used to be withdrawn from, as an array of `txid:vout`. These must be drawn from the node's available UTXO set
